Clearing the Ground.name: Clearing the Ground
Clearing the Ground.flavor: You sweep your blades in mighty arcs around you, cutting foes that get too close and thrusting them back.
Clearing the Ground.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Clearing the Ground.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Clearing the Ground.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Cold Steel Hurricane.name: Cold Steel Hurricane
Cold Steel Hurricane.flavor: You rush into the midst of your enemies and, like a freezing wind, flay them alive.
Cold Steel Hurricane.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Cold Steel Hurricane.special: Before you attack, shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Cold Steel Hurricane.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Cold Steel Hurricane.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks per target
Cold Steel Hurricane.effect: You regain your second wind if you have already used it during this encounter.
